GK19kragh_pu:308: kim apy ahiṃsyas tava cen mato 'haṃ yaśaḥśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:310: saṃbandham ābhāṣaṇapūrvam āhur vṛttaḥ sa nau saṃgatayor vanānte /

GK19kragh_pu:314: tasmin kṣaṇe pālayituḥ prajānām utpaśyataḥ siṃhanipātam ugram /
GK19kragh_pu:316: uttiṣṭha vatsety amṛtāyamānaṃ vaco niśamyotthitam utthitaḥ san /

GK19kragh_pu:318: taṃ vismitaṃ dhenur uvāca sādho māyāṃ mayodhbhāvya parīkṣito 'si /

GK19kragh_pu:323: vaṃśasya kartāram anantakīrtiṃ sudakṣiṇāyāṃ tanayaṃ yayāce // Ragh_2.64 //
GK19kragh_pu:324: saṃtānakāmāya tatheti kāmaṃ rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā /

GK19kragh_pu:339: yayāv anudghātasukhena mārgaṃ sveneva pūrṇena manorathena // Ragh_2.72 //

GK19kragh_pu:344: atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotir atrer iva dyauḥ surasarid iva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtam aiśam /

GK19kragh_pu:354: sthitālpatārāṃ karuṇendumaṇḍalāṃ vibhātakalpāṃ rajanīṃ vyaḍambayat // Ragh_3.2B //

GK19kragh_pu:361: upetya sā dohadaduḥkhaśīlatāṃ yad eva vavre tad apaśyad āhṛtam /

GK19kragh_pu:363: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohadavyathāṃ pracīyamānāvayavā rarāja sā /

GK19kragh_pu:368: nadīm ivāntaḥsalilāṃ sarasvatīṃ nṛpaḥ sasattvāṃ mahiṣīm amanyata // Ragh_3.9 //

GK19kragh_pu:373: kumārabhṛtyākuśalair anuṣṭhite bhiṣagbhir āptair atha garbhabharmaṇi /

GK19kragh_pu:379: ariṣṭaśayyāṃ parito visāriṇā sujanmanas tasya nijena tejasā /

GK19kragh_pu:411: dhiyaḥ samagraiḥ sa guṇair udāradhīḥ kramāc catasraś caturarṇavopamāḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:433: svedāmbunā mārjaya putra locane mamaiva yeneha turaṃgam īkṣase /

GK19kragh_pu:441: makhāṃśabhājāṃ prathamo manīṣibhis tvam eva devendra sadā nigadyase /

GK19kragh_pu:453: ato 'yam aśvaḥ kapilānukāriṇā pitus tvadīyasya mayāpahāritaḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:456: gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalv anirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān // Ragh_3.51 //
GK19kragh_pu:457: sa evam uktvā maghavantam unmukhaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ saśaram śarāsanam /
GK19kragh_pu:459: raghor avaṣṭambhamayena pattriṇā hṛdi kṣato gotrabhid apy amarṣaṇaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:460: navāmbudānīkamuhūrtalāñchane dhanuṣy amoghaṃ samadhatta sāyakam // Ragh_3.53 //
GK19kragh_pu:461: dilīpasūnoḥ sa bṛhad (?) bhujāntaraṃ praviśya bhīmāsuraśoṇitocitaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:462: papāv anāsvāditapūrvam āśugaḥ kutūhaleneva manuṣyaśoṇitam // Ragh_3.54 //
GK19kragh_pu:464: bhuje śacīpattraviśeṣakāṅkite svanāmacihnaṃ nicakhāna sāyakam // Ragh_3.55 //
GK19kragh_pu:465: jahāra cānyena mayūrapattriṇā śareṇa śakrasya mahāśanidhvajam /
GK19kragh_pu:466: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśaṃ suraśriyaḥ prasahaya keśavyaparopaṇād iva // Ragh_3.56 //
GK19kragh_pu:468: babhūva yuddhaṃ tumuulaṃ jayaiṣiṇor adhomukhair ūrdhvamukhaiś ca pattribhiḥ // Ragh_3.57 //
